name: Data support engineer
description:
EXANTE is an international investment company that provides direct market access and professional services to institutional investors, asset/wealth managers, brokerages and investment funds. Our one-stop multi-asset trading platform unlocks 400,000+ instruments including stocks & ETFs, options, bonds, futures, currencies and metals: https://exante.eu/ *Headquartered in London, UK EXANTE has international representation in 10+ European and Asian locations.

EXANTE is licensed by MFSA, CySEC, HK SFC and UK FCA and employs over 500 talents across the globe blending trading and technology skill sets.

Prerequisites:

- Understanding in FINTech area
- Experience in support and setup/configure systems
- Experience with SQL DB
- Experience with REST API
- Basic knowledge in Python
- Basic knowledge in *nix systems
- English B2

Job description:
- Needs to setup and support counterparty management system to get data from them
- Needs to support reconciliation/reporting tool for business operations

Benefits:

  • Work in a highly productive team building a financially successful FinTech company
  • Ability to see your result in production in a matter of days
  • Professional team with an engineering culture with an ability to learn from
  • Competitive compensation package
  • Extra medical insurance, including dental one
  • Co-financed professional education
  • Free lunch and snacks in the office
  • Flexible working hours and locations
